feed.title: Waterfly III Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.0
entry.content:
First v1 release ðŸ¥³

In the future, pre-releases will be submitted to the beta channel in Google Play, production releases will be submitted to the main channel.

  • Category Page: allow to exclude category from sum (#315)
  • Asset Account Transaction list: show FAB to add transaction (#311)
  • Layout fixes for Category Page

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.1
New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.2
entry.content:
• Show tags on transaction screen (thank you @tiltshiftfocus for PR #365)
  • Translation Updates (thank you @zynexiz and others)
  • Add additional banking apps (#351)
  • Bugfixes (#77, #349, #350)

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.3
New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.4
entry.content:
• Option to hide tags in transaction view (#375, #383)
  • Bugfix for custom certificates (#388, #367)
  • Support for additional banking apps
  • Minor bugfixes & improvements (#380, #387, #352, #384), thank you @rsergeychik
